struct.exostring:
Cut scene dialog that begins as soon as player is spawned into area. Canderous MUST be with the player (he's the one who gets them inside Davik's base).
First exit - move party to Ebon Hawk base Second exit point - move party to 8.02 room
Cut scene moves the party to the Ebon Hawk hangar. Davik continues conversation.
Cut scene moves player to 8.02. Davik continues conversation.
Davik and Calo leave area, destroy self
